name: Reference to prior recorded instrument
text: [§501-267]  Reference to prior recorded instrument.  Any instrument conveying or otherwise dealing with deregistered land and which requires a reference to a prior recorded instrument may satisfy the requirements of section 502-33 by reference to the land court document number (in the case of a document recorded pursuant to chapter 501) or to the book and page or bureau of conveyances document number (in the case of a document recorded pursuant to chapter 502) of the instrument to which reference is made. [L 2009, c 120, pt of §2, §21; am L 2013, c 119, §11]
